![https://hostodo.com](https://i.ibb.co/c2Gd8x3/Screen-Shot-2020-05-06-at-7-18-23-PM.png "")

Hello all,

Hostodo is a VPS hosting company in operation since late 2014. We offer NVMe based KVM VPSs in Las Vegas and Miami.

Our clients are loving our NVMe line and you will too :)

We are looking for some reviews, if you are interested in reviewing our services please DM me and we will set you up with a VPS.

**Features:**  

* Fast Intel PCIe NVMe drives in RAID1
* Free DirectAdmin License (Open a ticket)
* We own our IPv4 space
* We own and operate our own infrastructure
* IPv6 on all plans
* We accept Credit Card, PayPal, Cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, XRP, and more), AliPay, WeChat, and UnionPay

**Looking Glasses:**
Las Vegas, NV:
http://lv.hostodo.com/

Miami, FL:
http://mia.hostodo.com/
